resources.string: Isaac Newton discovered Gravity while sitting under an apple tree.
The cranial bones are in the knee.
The total surface area of two human lungs is approximately 70 square metres.
It is safe to add water in an acid
Reaction between ehthanoic acid and ethanol forms an ester
ultraviolet light has a wavelength higher than infrared light
Kirk Hammett is from the band \"METALLICA\".
The heaviest animal is the African Elephant.
Dihydrogen monoxide is unsafe for humans.
QWERTY is the most used keyboard worldwide.
